dashboard.subtitle: Ready to design your next championship session?
dashboard.createMotivation: Every great training starts with a single step. Create an unforgettable session for your players on the ice.
dashboard.createWizardDesc: Step-by-step wizard – category, ice, focus, layout
dashboard.createQuickDesc: Describe the session in your own words and AI will build it

create.title: Design Your Session
create.subtitle: AI-powered training generation tailored to your team's DNA.
create.modeSelectSubtitle: Choose how you want to create your training session
create.modeQuickDesc: Describe what you need in your own words. The AI extracts parameters and generates the session instantly.
create.modeWizardDesc: 7-step wizard with full control over every parameter. Choose category, ice, layout, focus, and more.
create.quickSubtitle: Tell the AI what you need in your own words. It will fill in the details using your coaching profile.
create.quickPageSubtitle: Describe your training and let AI handle the rest
create.quickPlaceholder: e.g. 60 min skating session for U12, full ice, 3 stations, focus on agility and edges...
create.quickGeneratingDesc: AI is analyzing your request and building a complete session
create.quickSmartDefaults: Smart defaults applied from your coaching profile (Coach DNA)

quickExamples.skating: 60 min skating session for U12, full ice, 3 stations, focus on edges and crossovers
quickExamples.shooting: 45 min shooting practice for U15, half ice, beginner difficulty
quickExamples.gameDay: 75 min game-day prep for U18, tactical focus with small area games
quickExamples.young: 45 min fun session for U6, basic skating and puck control

stepTitles: How should we organize the ice?
What's the focus of this session?
What type of session do you want?
stepSubtitles: Select the age category for your team
Set team size and session duration
Pick a station layout for the session
Set methodology and key focus areas
create.customLayoutNote: Custom layout editor coming soon. The AI will auto-generate zones based on your station count.

training.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this session?
training.drillBannedDesc: AI will avoid this drill in future sessions.
training.modifyPlaceholder: What would you like to change?

analytics.title: Coaching Analytics
analytics.noData: No data yet. Create training sessions first.

insights.title: AI Coaching Insights
insights.noInsights: No insights generated yet. Click Generate to analyze your coaching patterns.

myDrills.title: My Drills
myDrills.noFavorites: No favorite drills yet. Rate drills in your training sessions to build your library.
myDrills.noBanned: No banned drills. Ban drills you don't want AI to suggest again.
myDrills.noData: No drill data yet. Generate training sessions and rate drills to populate this section.

print.title: Print Training
print.loginRequired: Please log in to view this page.

inspiration.title: Drill Inspiration
inspiration.subtitle: Browse hockey drill diagrams with standard coaching symbols

plan.createSubtitle: Plan multiple trainings across weeks with AI-generated sessions
plan.stepWeeklyDesc: Choose focus areas for each week
plan.title: Plan Title
plan.weekNotesPlaceholder: e.g. Focus on power play setups...
plan.modeSelectSubtitle: Choose how you want to create your training plan
plan.modeQuickDesc: Describe your plan in your own words. AI will create a structured multi-week program instantly.
plan.modeWizardDesc: Set every parameter yourself — duration, focus per week, methodology, and more.
plan.quickSubtitle: Tell the AI what training plan you need. It will create a structured multi-week plan with individual sessions.
plan.quickPageSubtitle: Describe your plan and let AI handle the rest
plan.quickPlaceholder: e.g. 4-week plan for U15, 3 trainings per week, start with skating fundamentals and progress to game tactics...
plan.quickGeneratingDesc: AI is building a complete multi-week plan with individual sessions. This may take a moment.

quickExamples.preseason: 4-week pre-season program for U15, 3x per week, focus on skating and conditioning first, then tactics
quickExamples.skills: 3 weeks of skill development for U12, 2 trainings per week, progressive difficulty
quickExamples.tournament: 2-week tournament prep for U18, 4x per week, game situations and power play
quickExamples.young: 4 weeks for U10, 2x per week, fun activities with basic skills progression

consultation.title: AI Coaching Buddy
consultation.subtitle: Get expert AI evaluation of your setup before generating
consultation.analyzingDesc: AI is evaluating the training parameters and impact
consultation.errorMsg: Could not generate evaluation. Try again.

auth.heroDescription: Generate professional-grade training sessions in seconds using advanced AI tailored to your team's unique DNA.
auth.smartAnalyticsDesc: Track drill ratios and skill development over time.
auth.instantGenDesc: Create full 60min plans in under 30 seconds.
auth.proMethodologyDesc: Based on Swedish, Canadian, and USA Hockey models.
auth.signInSubtitle: Sign in to access your coaching dashboard.
auth.noAccount: Don't have an account? Simply log in to get started automatically.

knowledge.title: Drill Library
knowledge.subtitle: Your personal drill database. AI uses these drills when generating training sessions.
knowledge.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this drill?
knowledge.emptySubtitle: Add your own custom drills from text descriptions or upload drill diagram images. AI will prioritize your custom drills when generating training sessions. The system also includes an internal database of 114 professional drills based on hockey methodologies.
knowledge.uploadHint: JPG, PNG or photo of a drill diagram. AI will analyze and extract the drill details.
knowledge.importSeedDesc: Imports 110+ hockey drills with detailed descriptions, categories and tags into your library.
knowledge.importConfirm: Do you want to import the basic hockey drill database? Approximately 114 drills will be added to your library.
knowledge.bulkHint: Paste multiple drills at once. AI will automatically split and categorize each drill. Separate drills with empty lines or numbering.
knowledge.bulkPlaceholder:
1. Power skating drill - players skate full speed from goal line to blue line and back...

2. 2-on-1 rush drill - two forwards attack against one defender...
knowledge.bulkFailed: Failed to parse and import drills

coachChat.promptSubtitle: Discuss training plans, methodology, or share how you feel about your sessions.
coachChat.title: CoachAI Chat
coachChat.welcome: Hi! I'm your AI coaching assistant. Ask me anything about training, methodology, or share your thoughts.
coachChat.suggestion1: How should I structure my next training?
coachChat.suggestion2: What methodology works best for U12?
coachChat.suggestion3: I feel my trainings lack intensity.
coachChat.errorReply: Sorry, I couldn't process your message. Please try again.
